column1: Smoque BBQ////SO...all in all...Smoque has some pretty good meat
column2: but the sauce issue is infuriating! If I could bring in my own bottle of Sweet Baby Rays
column3: I might have a totally different view. BYOSauce! But as it stands
column4: if some buddies say "Hey let's goto Smoque!" I won't protest
column5: but I'm not excited for a repeat. Next time I go
column7: I'm definitely getting more St. Louis Ribs and bringing my own sauce!
